.. _`design_system_components_collapsible`:

Collapsible
===========

.. figure:: images/component_collapsible.png
   :align: center


Description
-----------

Collapsible component that consists of a header and a body. It is used to hide and show large amount of content. Inside the body, child components are displayed. The header consists of a clickable expander control and a headline. If the control is clicked, the body will be collapsed/expanded.

The :ref:`cs-web-components-base-components.PersistentCollapsible.__default__` component can be used to make the state persistent.
